doc.title: Conversaciones en la oscuridad

editors.editor: Niño de Rivera Guerrero, Roberto Gerardo

directors.director: Niño de Rivera Guerrero, Roberto Gerardo

producers.producer: Niño de Rivera Guerrero, Roberto Gerardo

writers.writer: Niño de Rivera Guerrero, Roberto Gerardo

doc.plot: Ana had died; she died in an abandoned warehouse at the mercy of her captors. She died for a crime that she did not commit but for which she was blamed. Her stay was not very long but while she was alive she knew the truth by which she was kidnapped.
